title: Rita's Brazilian carrot cake with chocolate icing
ingredients: ['3 medium carrots, peeled and chopped (no more than 300g total)', '3 large eggs', '240ml vegetable oil', '400g caster sugar', '250g plain flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', 'Chocolate icing', '250ml milk', '200g caster sugar', '4 tablespoons cocoa powder', '1 tablespoon cornflour']
